text: (næve gaman karana) ovunva (suli sulam hama, hæma pættenma) rala mudun vahala men vatakara gat avasthavedi allahta avanata vi kalavam novuna manasin yutuva ohuta aradhana kara, prarthana karannaha. ohu ovunva veralehi goda bassava bera gatte nam, ovungen samaharekma itamat santa lilaven katayutu karannaha. (vædi deneku simava ikmava katayutu karannaha). itamat gunamaku aparadhakaruvan hæra, (vena kisivekut) apage sadhakayan (mese) pratiksepa karanne næta
